name: 21 International Conference on Infectious Diseases
content: We are pleased and honored to invite you to the “21st International Conference on Infectious Diseases” which is going to be held during March 01-02, 2022 | Berlin, Germany. This conference is organized around the theme “Novel Treatment and Innovative approaches for Infectious Diseases” which covers a wide range of critically important sessions from basic research to latest innovations in the field of Infectious Diseases. For more details please have glands at: https://infectious-diseases-week.euroscicon.com/
